definition: Taiwan equivalent of 里根[Li3 gen1]
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Last night they went to Regent Street with Gretel to see the decorations.
sentences.chinese: 晚上和格萊託同去雷根大街觀看節日裝飾。

sentences.english: At this time, Mr. Regan carried out the policy of "deregulation" or called Reaganomics .
sentences.chinese: 此時雷根推行放手讓企業自由發展的政策。

sentences.english: Neo- conservatism prevailed in the Reagan era.
sentences.chinese: 在雷根當政期間，新保守主義盛行。

definition: Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
Taiwan equivalent of 布什[Bu4 shi2]
rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
Cheney (name)/Richard B. "Dick" Cheney (1941-), US Republican politician, vice-president 2001-2008
(name) Larson, Larsen, Larsson or Lassen etc
